description: This graph represents the core functionality of a system that processes user queries, generates responses using a language model, and stores interaction history. The main flow involves receiving a query, retrieving relevant information, generating a response, and then saving the interaction. Its purpose is to provide an interactive question-answering system with memory.

components.name: Query Processor
components.description: Handles incoming user queries and prepares them for further processing.

components.name: Information Retriever
components.description: Fetches relevant information based on the processed query from a knowledge base.

components.name: Response Generator
components.description: Utilizes a language model to generate a natural language response.

components.name: History Logger
components.description: Stores the user query and the generated response for future reference.

components.name: Unclassified
components.description: Component for all unclassified files and utility functions (Utility functions/External Libraries/Dependencies)
